sense.gloss: to wither, to wilt, to droop, to fade
to be dejected, to be disheartened, to be depressed, to be crestfallen
to wither (of flowers, dreams, etc.), to wilt, to droop, to shrivel, to fade (away), to sag, to deflate

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑傲慢↑↓ごうまん↓が↑凋落↑↓ちょうらく↓に↑繋↑↓つな↓がった。
sdata.e: His arrogance led to his downfall.

words.gloss: to wither, to wilt, to droop, to fade
to wither (of flowers, dreams, etc.), to wilt, to droop, to shrivel, to fade (away), to sag, to deflate
